r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $10.4M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with Biomerieux Canada. The average
  contract duration was 1.15 years, and the average contract value
  (not including contracts under $10k) was $1.4M. The longest
  contract was 4 years. The largest contract by value (including
  amendments) was $27.6M.
lookup_name: 'BIOMERIEUX CANADA'
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '10.4M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts: '36'
s431_number_of_contracts_with_amendments: '11'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '31%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage: '442%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments: '1.64'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value: '7.2M'
s424_mean_duration: '1.15'
s421_mean_contract_value: '1.4M'
s425_max_duration: '4'
s422_max_contract_value: '27.6M'
---
